/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
